text: in this demo we will cover how to review
recorded conversations
note that conversations are only
recorded once an agent is connected to a
customer
once you have logged into the Amazon
connect instance you will be redirected
to the home page
to view the recorded conversations hover
over the analytics and optimization icon
under contact lens click on context
search
we can review the recorded conversations
by applying a date range filter
under filters select time range and
select December 15 2022
each conversation that is recorded will
have a recording or transcript column
the first icon is the play icon
clicking on it we can listen to a
recording for voice conversations we can
also download recordings by clicking on
the download icon which will be in a way
formats as shown here
finally we can delete recordings if it
is no longer needed by clicking on the
bin icon
when playing back a recording you can
fast forward rewind pause adjust
playback speed and select a specific
time stamp to play
to do this we can start by clicking on
the contact ID
if we are looking for a specific section
in the recording we can select the
section in which we want to start
playing from by selecting the time under
the recording header
for slow or fast listeners we can adjust
the playback speed by selecting on the
speed icon
we can pause and play the recording by
selecting the play icon
finally we can fast forward the
recording by selecting the fast forward
tin or rewind the recording by selecting
the rewind 10 icon
by reviewing recorded conversations we
are able to train and enable our contact
center staff to better assist customers
allowing for proactive customer service
strategies
thank you for joining me on learning how
to review recorded conversations
